name: com.unity.hairfx
description:
The Unity HairFX is a strands based real-time hair rendering and simulation system, this hair system is based on AMD's TressFX opensource frameworks. 

Supports Rendering Pipineline:
Universal Render Pipeline (URP) and High Definition Render Pipeline (HDRP).

Support Platforms:
From mobile to high-end consoles and PC.

Prerequisite:
URP/HDRP version 12.x.x & Unity Editor version 2021.2.x  or Newer

GitHub: https://github.com/Unity-China/com.unity.hairfx
